column1: New church underconstruction  +  Mina & Maro engagement

column2:
The GUC Student Union is concerned about increasing health awareness and introducing healthy lifestyles to the GUCians. Hence, on Friday 6th March, The GUCSU  will hold a run around the GUC Campus to enhance the GUCiansโ health.

No Excuses, just put on your running shoes and jog to our booth in front of the sports area(VolleyBall court-Between B&C buildings) to register to the event. 


Find the nearest point to your home and call the bus driver to know the exact time and meeting point.
The buses arrive at 10 am to the GUC. Make sure you call the bus driver now or earlier in the morning.
#GUCRUN #byGUCSU
Driver's Name Meetingpoint Number
3am Hesham NasrCity 01066610019
3am salah Heliopolis 01066610018
3am rabee3 Heliopolis 01066610015
MohamedSaleh Maadi 01066610007
3am 3alaa2 Mohandseen 01066610046
3am 3aziz Rehab 01066610001

"Christmas is forever, not for just one day,
for loving, sharing, giving, are not to put away
like bells and lights and tinsel, in some box upon a shelf.
The good you do for others is good you do yourself..."
~Norman Wesley Brooks (U.S. design engineer, 1923-2002)
"Let Every Day Be Christmas," 1976

King Team Team, Gwargios & Anba Antonios Church is inviting you to attend its Christmas Bazaar on Friday & Saturday December 12 - 13 in the Green Hall.
There will be lot of products, games, face painting, nail polish art & lot of surprises.

Waiting to see you all.
Don't miss it.
Please, come & invite others.

For Table Rent, please, contact Christine on 01005191024

Parthenians,

Next Tuesday, we are honored by the presence of Fr. Bishoy Edward, who will be discussing with us:

The Strongest Wireless Connection

Don't miss the chance to be part of the discussion!

It's this time of the year where we engulf our new family members with this love and warmth.

" Who may make discovery of a woman of virtue? For her price is much higher than jewels. The heart of her husband has faith in her" (Proverbs31:10) 

We would love to invite all of you, dear family and friends to pray with us and share our happy moments so that God would bless our next steps to complete this life project and build a new church according to His Holy Will 

 PLEASE we need you all to be there in our Engagement Prayer in St Mary and St Atahansius Church- Nasr City  on Saturday, the 04th of October at 2:00 pm

 Your presence will complete our joy...

"So they are no longer two, but one flesh. What therefore God has joined together, let no man separate." (Matthew 19:6)

We are finally getting MARRIED :D

Our dearest friends, It's our pleasure to invite you to our BIG DAY
We will be more than happy to be able to share this special day be with you , your presence will mean a lot to us. 
Waiting for all of you & please don't be late ;)

Mina & Sherry
